attributes.action: Cut FUEL TAX & Make the MPS turn up this TIME!
attributes.additional_details:
Rising cost of supplies and fuel, businesses are forced to put prices up. In the situation we in people cant afford to eat or use gas. 
People who worked hard all there life struggling to enjoy there retirement and instead struggling to live.
Something needs to be done and MPS need to make the effort to turn up this time. Handful of people in commons disgusting. If it was about there pay the commons is full. The problem is the government is to greedy and earning a fortune on high fuel prices.
attributes.background: Cut the fuel tax to help ease the cost of living. Its not just fuel but fuel has a big impact on cost of items we buy. For example Food, necessary items. Cutting the fuel will not help ease cost of living but also help businesses out.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for related actions:

Suspend VAT on road fuels to reduce fuel costs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610567

Temporarily suspend all taxes on all fuels and energy bills
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610585

Take urgent actions to address the extreme cost of living crisis
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612439
